scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n next,api -c blue,green "next dev" "npm run api:dev"
scripts.prebuild: npx tsx scripts/generate-search-index.ts && npx tsx scripts/cache-vndb-images.ts
scripts.api:import: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec worker python scripts/initial_import.py
scripts.api:update: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec worker python -c "import asyncio; from scripts.worker import run_daily_update; asyncio.run(run_daily_update())"
scripts.api:status: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec api python scripts/check_db_status.py
scripts.api:migrate: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec api alembic upgrade head
scripts.api:data-migrate: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec api python -c "import asyncio; from app.ingestion.data_migrations import run_pending_migrations, load_migrations; load_migrations(); asyncio.run(run_pending_migrations())"
scripts.api:update-column: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose exec api python -m app.ingestion.column_updater
scripts.api:bot: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose up discord-bot
scripts.api:bot:logs: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose logs -f discord-bot
scripts.api:logs:api: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose logs -f api
scripts.api:logs:worker: cd vndb-stats-backend && docker compose logs -f worker
